name: CVE-2000-0091
description: Buffer overflow in vchkpw/vpopmail POP authentication package allows remote attackers to gain root privileges via a long username or password.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:inter7:vpopmail:vchkpw_3.4.6:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:inter7:vpopmail:vchkpw_3.4.5:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:inter7:vpopmail:vchkpw_3.4.11:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:inter7:vpopmail:vchkpw_3.4.8:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:inter7:vpopmail:vchkpw_3.4.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:inter7:vpopmail:vchkpw_3.4.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:inter7:vpopmail:vchkpw_3.4.9:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:inter7:vpopmail:vchkpw_3.4.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:inter7:vpopmail:vchkpw_3.4.7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:inter7:vpopmail:vchkpw_3.4.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
